title: Strings
concept: This level builds core string manipulation skills in C. Focus on traversing characters using loops, avoiding strcpy/strcat/strlen unless specified. Pay attention to whitespace-sensitive output. Do not print extra messages.

challenges.title: String Length
challenges.description: Read a string and print its length without using strlen().

challenges.title: Count Vowels
challenges.description: Count vowels (a,e,i,o,u in both cases) in the given string.

challenges.title: Count Consonants
challenges.description: Read a string and count consonants (alphabet but not vowel).

challenges.title: Palindrome Check
challenges.description: Print Yes if the string is palindrome else No.

challenges.title: Copy String (manual)
challenges.description: Copy string S1 to S2 without using strcpy(). Print S2.

challenges.title: Concatenate (manual)
challenges.description: Concatenate two strings without using strcat().

challenges.title: First Occurrence
challenges.description: Print the index of first occurrence of character X in string S. If not found print -1.

challenges.title: Last Occurrence
challenges.description: Print index of last occurrence of character X.

challenges.title: Word Count
challenges.description: Count total words in a sentence. Words are separated by spaces.
examples:
Input:
Hello world from C → Output:
4

challenges.title: Character Frequency
challenges.description: Count how many times each lowercase alphabet a–z appears. Print 26 lines a:x
examples:
Input:
apple
Output:
a:1
b:0
c:0
...
p:2
...
z:0
